ValidationRule.description: Only Admins/the NPS Surveyor may make edits to the Response record when the NPS has been closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(NPS__r.Status__c, "Closed"), $User.Id != NPS__r.NPS_Surveyor__c, $Permission.System_Administrator = FALSE, $Permission.Regional_Delegated_Administrator = FALSE, $Permission.Delegated_Admin = FALSE, $Permission.Country_Delegated_Administrator = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the NPS Surveyor or an Administrator can edit NPS Responses for Closed NPS Surveys.
